history.proof: intros P Q R a b HredIn Q1 Hincl. induction HredIn. - apply redIn0b. shelve. - apply redIn0. now apply Hincl. - apply redIn1. shelve. - shelve.

ctx: intros P Q R a b HredIn Q1 Hincl.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros P Q R a b HredIn Q1 Hincl.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "incl Q Q1" on hypothesis of type "red A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (spolyp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a b) R".

ctx: intros P Q R a b HredIn Q1 Hincl.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) P, Q, R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM H : red A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (spolyp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a b) R Q1 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) Hincl : incl Q Q1 Unable to unify "incl Q Q1" with "red A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (spolyp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a b) R".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (P Q R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (a b : poly A0 eqA ltM), redIn a b P Q R -> forall Q1 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM), incl Q Q1 -> redIn a b P Q1 R

Premises:

incl : forall A : Type, list A -> list A -> Prop

reduce0_reducestar : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> exists t : list (Term A n), reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p t
ltP_reduce : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> ltP (A:=A) ltM q p
nf : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), (forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) -> OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> poly A0 eqA ltM -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> poly A0 eqA ltM

``` 
intros P Q R a b HredIn Q1 Hincl.
induction HredIn.
- apply redIn0b.
- apply redIn0. 
  now apply Hincl.
- apply redIn1.
  + apply Hincl in H.
    now apply Hincl.
```

original: intros P Q R a b HredIn Q1 Hincl. induction HredIn. - apply redIn0b. - apply redIn0. now apply Hincl. - apply redIn1. + apply Hincl in H. now apply Hincl.
